players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to keep the town safe."
Diana: "Charlie, accusing Bob so quickly feels rushed. We should discuss more before deciding who to vote out."
Diana: "Bob, staying silent after being accused looks suspicious. Can you explain why you haven't said anything yet?"
Charlie: "Bob’s silence is very telling. Diana, I understand wanting to discuss more, but with a confirmed mafioso among us, acting fast is critical. Let’s vote Bob out now."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to keep the town safe."
Diana: "Charlie, accusing Bob so quickly feels rushed. We should discuss more before deciding who to vote out."
Diana: "Bob, staying silent after being accused looks suspicious. Can you explain why you haven't said anything yet?"
You: "Bob’s silence is very telling. Diana, I understand wanting to discuss more, but with a confirmed mafioso among us, acting fast is critical. Let’s vote Bob out now."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
